Job Title: Customer Communications Associate

Location: Fort Lauderdale, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Sales

Description:
Customer Communications AssociateEntry-LevelFull training provided
Company Overview:Citizendum stands as a pioneering force in the marketing industry, dedicated to delivering innovative solutions and unparalleled service to our esteemed clientele. With an unwavering commitment to excellence, we're expanding our team and seeking a talented Sales and Marketing Specialist to join our Fort Lauderdale office.
Job Description:As a Customer Communications Associate, you will play a crucial role in ensuring effective communication between our company and our valued customers. You will be responsible for managing various communications endeavors aiming to increase sales and revenue. Additionally, you will collaborate closely with the teams to gather feedback and insights to improve our products and services.
Job Responsibilities:Respond promptly to customer face-to-face inquiries .Identify customer needs and provide appropriate solutions or escalate issues to the relevant department for resolution.Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and transactions using our CRM system.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to address customer concerns and improve overall customer experience.Monitor customer feedback and trends to identify areas for improvement and suggest actionable insights.Uphold company values and policies while representing the company in all customer interactions.Identify and pursue new business prospects to achieve sales and marketing goals.
Qualifications:Eagerness to learn and a commitment to achieving success.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a strong focus on customer satisfaction.Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks in a fast-paced environment.Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Ability to work independently as well as part of a team.Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and requirements.
Benefits:Opportunity to work in a collaborative and supportive team environment.Competitive salary and benefits package.Growth and advancement opportunities within the company.Chance to make a meaningful impact on customer satisfaction and loyalty.Exciting and challenging projects that will enhance your skills and experience.
How to Apply:Interested candidates are encouraged to submit their applications via LinkedIn at the earliest opportunity.
Customer Communications AssociateEntry-LevelFull training provided

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
